long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scratch Payments is an extension that allows current Scratch veterinary partners to securely accept card payments through their wireless card readers on the Scratch Pay platform. Simply tap, dip or swipe to collect payment without ever leaving the page you are working on.
